name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Seasoned Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience specializing in **.NET**, **C#**, **SQL**, and **ASP.NET** frameworks to design and deliver robust backend systems. Proficient in building RESTful and GraphQL APIs that drive high-performance applications, employing **MVC** architectures and ensuring seamless integration with front-end technologies such as **HTML**, **JavaScript**, and **CSS**. Demonstrated success in leading **Agile** development teams, focusing on **problem-solving** and **mentorship** to foster collaboration and knowledge sharing. Previously contributed to high-impact projects at notable organizations, leveraging strong technical acumen and innovative strategies.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **.NET** and **C#** to engineer robust backend services, ensuring optimal performance and maintainability.
Implemented **ASP.NET** frameworks for developing scalable web applications, focusing on RESTful and **GraphQL** APIs to enhance user experience.
Designed and queried databases using **SQL** for efficient data management, achieving an **80%** reduction in query response time.
Led initiatives in **Agile** project management, coordinating with cross-functional teams to enhance productivity and problem-solving skills across projects.
Mentored junior developers, facilitating knowledge sharing sessions that improved team competency by **40%**.
Utilized **MVC** architecture to structure applications intuitively, resulting in **25%** fewer user-reported bugs post-launch.
Crafted interactive user interfaces with **HTML**, **CSS**, and **JavaScript**, ensuring compliance with modern web standards and accessibility guidelines.
Collaborated effectively with various departments to tackle integration challenges, oversee release strategies, and maintain project timelines.

Utilized **.NET** and **C#** frameworks to develop robust backend systems, ensuring the agile processing of complex data workflows and user interactions.
Engineered RESTful services and **GraphQL** APIs for efficient data retrieval and manipulation, directly improving user experience and speeds by approximately **30%**.
Collaborated within **cross-functional teams** to drive successful software releases and maintain compliance with industry standards, resulting in a **100%** on-time project delivery.
Implemented **SQL** for efficient data storage and retrieval, enhancing database performance and scalability for applications serving over **10,000** users.
Applied **Agile** methodologies to manage software development life cycles, leading to a **25%** improvement in team productivity and project turnaround times.
Conducted **mentorship** sessions to foster knowledge sharing and elevate team capability in adopting best practices, focusing on **MVC**, **HTML**, **CSS**, **JavaScript**, and **XML** technologies.
Led troubleshooting initiatives to resolve complex technical issues, utilizing advanced **problem-solving** skills to maintain system integrity and performance.

- Developed robust backend services aligned with **.NET** and **C#** frameworks to enhance trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, improving operational efficiency by **30%**.
- Engineered real-time price feed processors utilizing strong problem-solving skills with **REST** APIs and **WebSockets**, facilitating high-frequency transactions with an average latency reduction of **15ms**.
- Collaborated in cross-functional teams to deliver seamless data integration through **MVC** architecture and **HTML/CSS** interfaces, ensuring a user-friendly experience with **99%** uptime.
- Mentored junior developers in best practices regarding regulatory compliance following **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, ensuring the platform adheres to strict data security protocols, significantly reducing compliance incidents by **40%**.
- Implemented comprehensive automated test suites using **SQL** for data verification, **PyTest**, and mock servers to streamline QA processes, resulting in a **25%** faster release cycle.
- Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and improving process management efficiency by **50%**.
- Actively engaged in knowledge sharing sessions focusing on **Agile** methodologies and best software development practices, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement across the team.
